price: 50. Maka orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka memperoleh ampunan dan rezeki yang mulia.
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
